name: Z Arena (itch)
description:
Last man standing facing zombies and covid-19

It is a simple zombies game on "waves, rounds" mode.

there are no limits you can kill zombies and corona which actually designed in this game to look like a creepy monster.. <_< 

  • 3 Maps included.
  • 7 Weapons which you can upgrade.
  • Cash and Score! you can earn that by shooting enemies with an extra score for the HEADSHOT!.
  • Review weapons on main menu.
  • Dead shot [Power bullet], health, ammo, extra cash comes out of a dead zombies.
  • Use that cash to buy weapons and upgrade it to kill zombies faster! heal yourself and get some extra ammo, open doors and find out more.
  • The more score you get the more weapons available for you.
